seo.title: Work Experience
seo.description: My Work Experience in the field of software development

headline: My Work Experience
subheadline: This is my professional experience in the field of software development
body: The experience I was able to gain in various jobs alongside my studies and full-time. This list should mainly show my company-related experiences. In addition, I also deal with various projects and technologies in my spare time.

creatokia.title: Creatokia
creatokia.description: Creatokia is an NFT Marketplace for digital media. It is developed with Next.js and React. I developed an entire design system based on design specifications.

bookwireOS.title: Bookwire OS
bookwireOS.description: I developed new features in the existent Bookwire OS System with React in Frontend. I transferred the technology to SPA.

agido.title: Agido GmbH
agido.description: At Agido GmbH I was able to gain my first practical experience in the Java environment. Thereby I supported the development of a Java server and clients (with Swing).

bookwire.title: Bookwire GmbH
bookwire.description: At Bookwire GmbH I managed two frontend projects from conception, to development. I learned a lot about the practical use of web technology, especially React and Next.js.

tedi.title: Tedi GmbH
tedi.description: At Tedi GmbH, I further developed a front-end application in the logistics area. Angular can be used as a single page application framework.

brockhaus.title: Brockhaus AG
brockhaus.description: At Brockhaus AG I support various clients in the realization of frontend applications using React and Angular.
